00021 #ifndef STATEOBJ_HPP
00022 #define STATEOBJ_HPP
00023 
00024 #include "StateObj_forward.h"
00025 
00026 // The following is a little trick, to make sure no-one accidentally links together
00027 // debugging and non-debugging code (which are not link-compatable)
00028 #ifdef REENTER
00029 
00030 #ifdef MINION_DEBUG
00031 namespace StateObjNamespace_DEBUG
00032 #else
00033 namespace StateObjNamespace_RELEASE
00034 #endif
00035 {
00036 struct StateObj
00037 {
00038   // Forbid copying this type!
00039   StateObj(const StateObj&);
00040   void operator=(const StateObj&);
00041   
00042   Memory* searchMem_m;
00043   SearchOptions* options_m;
00044   SearchState state_m;
00045   Queues* queues_m;
00046   TriggerMem* triggerMem_m;
00047   VariableContainer* varContainer_m;
00048   BoolContainer* backtrack_bools; 
00049 public:
00050 
00051   StateObj() :
00052     searchMem_m(new Memory),
00053     options_m(new SearchOptions),
00054     state_m(this),
00055     queues_m(new Queues(this)),
00056     triggerMem_m(new TriggerMem(this)),
00057     varContainer_m(new VariableContainer(this)),
00058     backtrack_bools(new BoolContainer(this))
00059   { }
00060 
00061   ~StateObj()
00062   { 
00063     delete backtrack_bools;
00064     delete varContainer_m;
00065     delete triggerMem_m;
00066     delete queues_m;
00067     delete options_m;
00068     delete searchMem_m;    
00069     D_ASSERT(memBlockCache.empty());
00070   }
00071 };
00072 
00073 }
00074 
00075 #ifdef MINION_DEBUG
00076 using namespace StateObjNamespace_DEBUG;
00077 #else
00078 using namespace StateObjNamespace_RELEASE;
00079 #endif
00080 
00081 
00082 inline BoolContainer& getBools(StateObj* stateObj)
00083 { return *(stateObj->backtrack_bools); }
00084 inline SearchOptions& getOptions(StateObj* stateObj)
00085 { return *(stateObj->options_m); }
00086 inline SearchState& getState(StateObj* stateObj)
00087 { return stateObj->state_m; }
00088 inline Queues& getQueue(StateObj* stateObj)
00089 { return *(stateObj->queues_m); }
00090 inline Memory& getMemory(StateObj* stateObj)
00091 { return *(stateObj->searchMem_m); }
00092 inline TriggerMem& getTriggerMem(StateObj* stateObj)
00093 { return *(stateObj->triggerMem_m); }
00094 inline VariableContainer& getVars(StateObj* stateObj)
00095 { return *(stateObj->varContainer_m); }
00096 
00097 #else
00098 
00099 #ifdef MINION_DEBUG
00100 namespace StateObjNamespace_DEBUG
00101 #else
00102 namespace StateObjNamespace_RELEASE
00103 #endif
00104 { struct StateObj {}; }

00106 #ifdef MINION_DEBUG
00107 using namespace StateObjNamespace_DEBUG;
00108 #else
00109 using namespace StateObjNamespace_RELEASE;

00112 VARDEF(StateObj _noreenter_stateObj);
00113 VARDEF(Memory searchMem_m);
00114 VARDEF(SearchOptions options_m);
00115 VARDEF_ASSIGN(SearchState state_m, &_noreenter_stateObj);
00116 VARDEF_ASSIGN(Queues queues_m, &_noreenter_stateObj);
00117 VARDEF_ASSIGN(TriggerMem triggerMem_m, &_noreenter_stateObj);
00118 VARDEF_ASSIGN(VariableContainer varContainer_m, &_noreenter_stateObj);
00119 VARDEF_ASSIGN(BoolContainer bools_m, &_noreenter_stateObj);
00120 
00121 inline BoolContainer& getBools(StateObj* stateObj)
00122 { return bools_m; }
00123 inline SearchOptions& getOptions(StateObj* stateObj)
00124 { return options_m; }
00125 inline SearchState& getState(StateObj* stateObj)
00126 { return state_m; }
00127 inline Queues& getQueue(StateObj* stateObj)
00128 { return queues_m; }
00129 inline Memory& getMemory(StateObj* stateObj)
00130 { return searchMem_m; }
00131 inline TriggerMem& getTriggerMem(StateObj* stateObj)
00132 { return triggerMem_m; }
00133 inline VariableContainer& getVars(StateObj* stateObj)
00134 { return varContainer_m; }
00135 #endif

00137 #ifndef MANY_VAR_CONTAINERS
00138 template<typename DomType>
00139 inline BoundVarContainer<DomType>& BoundVarRef_internal<DomType>::getCon_Static()
00140 { return varContainer_m.boundVarContainer; }
00141 
00142 inline BooleanContainer& BoolVarRef_internal::getCon_Static()
00143 { return varContainer_m.booleanContainer; }
00144 
00145 template<typename DomType>
00146 inline SparseBoundVarContainer<DomType>& SparseBoundVarRef_internal<DomType>::getCon_Static()
00147 { return varContainer_m.sparseBoundVarContainer; }
00148 
00149 template<typename d_type>
00150 inline BigRangeVarContainer<d_type>& BigRangeVarRef_internal_template<d_type>::getCon_Static()
00151 { return varContainer_m.bigRangeVarContainer; }
00152 
00153 #endif
00154 
00155 // Must be defined later.
00156 inline SearchState::~SearchState()
00157 { 
00158   for(int i = 0; i < constraints.size(); ++i)
00159     delete constraints[i];
00160 #ifdef DYNAMICTRIGGERS
00161   for(int i = 0; i < dynamic_constraints.size(); ++i)
00162     delete dynamic_constraints[i];
00163 #endif
00164 }

00167 #endif
